nodes.text: The Manda Merchant Route was a hyperlane that stretched from Bothawui in the Mid Rim to Molavar in the Outer Rim Territories. It was established at some point before the Great Sith War of 4000 BBY–3996 BBY, although it only reached as far as Manda at that time. By 1000 BBY, however, it had been extended to its modern terminus of Molavar.
